stanza:label: Identifiers.org URI copy button
stanza:definition: Button widget to be embedded into pages to copy relevant identifiers.org URIs to the user's clipboard. The resolution service is used to converge URLs into identifiers.org URIs. By default, it converges the current window location URL to an identifiers.org URI, but an overwrite option is available. Additional options for styling and customization are available.

stanza:parameter.stanza:description: What to use as label for the button.
Whether to have the icon on the button label.
Classes to inject on the generated button.

Overwrite browser location with URL. By default, the widget uses the browser location where the widget is loaded. Use this if the browser URL is different from the URL pattern in the identifiers.org registry.
Whether to compute the identifiers.org URI on load instead of on the first click.
Duration a flash message is shown on the button. In milliseconds.
Semicolon separated list of CSS stylesheets to add to widget. Useful with the button-classes parameter.
